attributes.action: Providing an indoor play area in Queenborough,Kent.
attributes.additional_details:
We have a need for an indoor play area based in Queenborough, Kent. The local existing facilities are inadequate in size and not always suitable for a range of ages. We put this to you to provide a service to local people and the possibility of employment opportunities for people In the local area.
After speaking to many people, this is a service that is being repeatedly requested.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority to deal with, not the UK Government.
